column4: hey all, Does any1 know if its possible to print to a windows printer on the lan through the firewall, using a combination of portwarding of releveant tcp and udp ports used for windows printing...or can reccomend some more elagant solution?
I believe so, with samba and cups
I'd sooner set up the printer on the linux box and share it out, but I suppose it could bedone the other way around
